reviews.review: Como não amar um jogo que remete a infância e adolescência? Porém, a relação de amor e ódio é grande... hackers, trolls, toxicidade acabam tirando o tesão do jogo
nice game i love it, super fun
Dope ass Map! Guy is cash money. Must check out.
Que se puede decir es el CS. 1.6 mejorado. Impecable
全球最猛射擊遊戲 沒話說吧
O melhor jogo de todos os tempos, sem dúvidas. só peca no anti cheater
Отыграв 1000 с лишним часов я понял, что я вообще не понял зачем я потратил 1000 часов своей жизни.
This was at one point in time my favorite game. Now that the game is free to play it is full of nothing but hackers. Don't waste your time trying to learn a game you're unable to learn. Garbage.
i didn't find better FPS game than this CSGO
im not good with FPS games but well,this is a noice game
Ótimo game, experiências incríveis, porém há muitos tóxicos e hackers

fuck em we ball

still shit
el mejor puto juego del mundo
If you play it seriously it isn't fun, if you play it wacky and have a bunch of fun you get shit on and people yell at you for not taking it seriously, i just wanna have fun but game so toxic i cant.

Jeu de merde ! Je suis constamment en tête des frags dans les jeux avec des élites mondiales ! Le jeu ne m'apparie qu'avec le meilleur des meilleurs ! J'ai battu pratiquement tous les meilleurs professionnels du jeu ! J'ai laissé tomber 40 dans un match contre FAZE CLAN !!!!!! Mais mon rang est toujours ARGENT. QU'EST-CE QUE MERDE ! METTEZ-MOI DANS GLOBAL. Je suis toujours le meilleur dans chaque jeu, la seule fois où je ne suis pas top frag, c'est quand je joue avec des tricheurs de merde !!!! (Ce qui est comme presque tous les jeux, je suis actuellement le meilleur frag dans environ trente pour cent de mes matchs, donc soixante-dix pour cent des jeux sont avec des tricheurs ! Corrigez votre jeu Counter-Strike !
Kept me busy for a 1000 hours <3
Сделайте нормальный античит будет  отличная игра
Best competitive action pack game ive ever played.

За 100 часов смог узнать всё о своей родословной, будущей жизни. За 300 часов узнал о своей ориентации. За 700 часов понял, что я никто. За 1000 часов теперь и я занимаюсь такой же х*йней. Отличный симулятор получения унижений в твою сторону.
nach 500 std kann ich flüssig russisch

I tried another Russian language instruction program named Rosetta Stone, but it just wasn't working for me. I decided to play CSGO instead and ended up learning Russian in about 2 weeks.

10/10 would recommend for learning Russian. Very interactive as well.
Terrible weno subi 45 kilos pero ta bn

Jogo muito bom, pena que está tendo muitos cheats
$30 for a game that became free a few weeks later. Love to see it.
I LIKE THIS GAME SO MUCH
very nice. much fun. should buy prime @realfathergerald @muchlag
The best game i´ve ever played in pc

Oyunda haddinden fazla hile var. Ve bunun anlık şikayet edip belirte bileceğim hiç bir seçeneğim yok. Sadece report etmekle yetiniyorum. Bir de oyunda kendı takım arkadaşların arasında 2 tane oyunu trollemek ( sabote etmek ) için girenlere karşı yapılacak hiç bir şey yok. Bu konuların dikkate alınmaması halinde ben sürekli olumsuz yorumlar atmaya devam edeceğim.
e legal o jogo mais poderia te bazuca custando 10000 para compra seria muito legal porvavo se botarem eu troco minha nota
